overview: Pam Haas has more than 20 years of experience working with leading brands to optimize their email, database and direct marketing efforts. Pam came to Goodmail from Alliant Cooperative Data Solutions, where she served as vice president, sales and business development. Prior to her time at Alliant, Pam held sales management roles at Equifax Marketing Services (EMS), which provides database marketing services to leading marketers in the U.S., and Bigfoot Interactive (now part of Epsilon), one of the worldâ€™s largest email services providers (ESPs). Pam graduated from Hofstra University with a Bachelor of Arts in Marketing.
